column2: ggplot(aes(x = reorder(county_code, resi_mean, desc), y = resi_mean, fill=factor(ifelse(county_code=="Philadelphia","Highlighted","Normal")))) +

labs(title = "2015 Philly Index of good residential environment by conuty", subtitle = "Residential environment = Near Supermarket + Green Space Access + Walkability", y = "Index of good residential environment", x = "County" ) +
